required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Usage of LMA Protector on Patients Who Undergo Laparoscopic Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: The Comparison of Protector LMA and Endotracheal Tube in Patients Undergoing Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy Under General Anesthesia A Randomize Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: LMA Protector is a recently developed second generation laryngeal mask several kinds of different laryngeal masks were used for the airway management during laparoscopic surgeries. However there is a lack of knowledge for the use of LMA Protector during laparoscopic surgery .In this study researchers aim to determine the effectivity of LMA Protector and plan to analyse the orofaryngeal cuff pressure and fiberoptic grading scale measurements .

detailed_description.textblock: Tracheal intubation may have more complications than laryngeal masks. In this study researchers aim to determine the effectivity of LMA Protector and on the otherside the heamodynamic variables and the complication rates between tracheal ıntubation and laryngeal mask insertion will be compared.

primary_outcome.measure: Ventilatory efficiency pressures for the LMA Protector
primary_outcome.description: Oropharyngeal pressure leak test, the peak airway pressures will be determined

secondary_outcome.description: The grading of fiberoptic view of larynx through the LMA Protector

secondary_outcome.measure: Ease of insertion of LMA Protector
secondary_outcome.description: Each attemption to insert LMA will be record.

arm_group.description: LMA Protector will be inserted by a blind researcher after standart anesthesia induction. The view of the larynx will be assessed using fiberoptic grading scale
Patients will be intubated after standart anesthesia induction and we will record heamodynamic variables. including mean blood pressure and heart rate

intervention.description: LMA Protector will be inserted by a blind researcher after standart anesthesia induction. The view of the larynx will be assessed using fiberoptic grading scale
tracheal intubation will be perform after standart anaesthetic induction and heamodynamic variables including blood pressure heart rate and possible complications will be observed

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ASA class I-III patients
- Patients undergo laparoscopic surgeries
- Laparoscopic surgeries duration of less than 2 hours
Exclusion Criteria:
- Difficult intubation history
- BMI>35
- Open cholesistectomies

reference.citation: Singh K, Gurha P. Comparative evaluation of Ambu AuraGain™ with ProSeal™ laryngeal mask airway in patients undergoing laparoscopic cholecystectomy. Indian J Anaesth. 2017 Jun;61(6):469-474. doi: 10.4103/ija.IJA_163_17.

Park SY, Rim JC, Kim H, Lee JH, Chung CJ. Comparison of i-gel® and LMA Supreme® during laparoscopic cholecystectomy. Korean J Anesthesiol. 2015 Oct;68(5):455-61. doi: 10.4097/kjae.2015.68.5.455. Epub 2015 Sep 30.

patient_data.ipd_description: the reason is not to cause bias between the researchers
